meanings.definition: Less lovely in appearance or character.
meanings.sent1: The old, unlovelier house stood out among the new, colorful ones.
meanings.sent2: She felt unlovelier than usual after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The unlovelier painting actually grew on me over time.
meanings.sent4: Her unlovelier personality was like a dark cloud hanging over the group.
meanings.sent5: The unlovelier garden was a stark contrast to the vibrant park nearby.

meanings.sent1: She sang unlovelier than the birds outside.
meanings.sent2: He played the piano unlovelier than his sister.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated unlovelier than expected, but it still tasted delicious.
meanings.sent4: The storm raged unlovelier than any other in recent memory.
meanings.sent5: The flowers wilted unlovelier with each passing day.
